definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: open wide (the mouth) (NH rarely = BH, usu. open bowels, go to stool; cf. JAram. [[פְּעַר]]; Ar. fa9ara and Syr. p9ar = BH, pe9ro0 chasm);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. of voracious greed, fig. 3 fs. [[וּפָֽעֲרָה פִּיהָ]] Is 5:14 (of Sheôl), 3 pl. [[פָּֽעֲרוּ עָלַי]] [[בְּפִיהֶם]] (Ges § 119 q) Job 16:10; of eager desire (good sense), [[פִּיהֶם פָּֽעֲרוּ]] Job 29:23, [[פִּי־פָעַרְתִּי]] Ps 119:131.
